roleset.name: cause to be burdened ith
roleset.note: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to load.01-v. Load.01 is a member of VN class spray-9.7-2. Framed by Katie.

example.name: medical usage - be careful!
example.text: There does appear to be significant peripheral loading of the seeds which appear to extend into the perirectal area as well as the perivascical area.
example.arg: of the seeds which appear to extend into the perirectal area as well as the perivascical area.
